statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET experience = 1000, level = 10 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 5, experience = 500 WHERE username = 'john_doe'
UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 5, experience = experience + 100 WHERE player_id = 100
UPDATE player_profiles SET experience = 500, level = level + 1 WHERE username = 'john_doe'
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_progress SET game_level = 4, timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE progress_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_level = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_progress SET game_level = 10, timestamp = '2021-08-25 12:00:00' WHERE player_id = 1 AND progress_id = 3;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE items_inventory SET quantity = 20, item_name = 'Sword' WHERE player_id = 1 AND item_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE game_progress SET score = 500, level_completed = level_completed + 1 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 3, experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 1001;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE player_id = 1002 AND item_id = 2001;
UPDATE player_profiles SET experience = experience + 100 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE player_progress SET score = 500, level_progress = 20 WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_id = 456;
UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 2 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE items_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE item_id = 5;
UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 2, experience = 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_progress SET score = 500, level = 3 WHERE player_id = (SELECT player_id FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'JohnDoe');
